fields.primary media:
You can request a digitized copy of the original document by submitting the
                        Document Request Form.
fields.title: [Names from French deportation lists research project]
fields.description: Electronic data created from original French transport lists from the Mémorial de la Shoah, Musée, Centre de documentation juive contemporaine (CDJC) in Paris, France, and occasionally other sources; data includes names, places and dates of birth, nationalities, and convoy, page and line numbers
